name: FeedLayoutFilter

fields.name: feedFilterName
fields.description: The name of a CustomFeedFilter component. Names are prefixed with the name of the parent object. For example, Case.MyCustomFeedFilter.

fields.name: feedItemType
fields.description: The type of feed item to display.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.FeedLayoutFilter.

description: Represents a feed filter option in the feed view of a feed-based page layout. A filter can have only standardFilter or feedItemType set.
